name: Iron Arsenal
description:
Control your base and mine resources to defend yourselves from the enemies

WASD to move your base

Space to toggle mining resources while you stand still on top of resources

B to enter build mode to build sentry, click on sockets to install new sentries

Sentries cost 50 copper, 50 iron and 20 gold

P to choose different main weapon type

P.S values are not balanced
